data.meta_description: Obituary for Shirley  A. (Morey)  Savery |           Shirley A. Savery, 78, of  Town Hill Rd. in Middlefield, died Saturday Jan 1st at Mount Greylock Extended Care Facility in Pittsfield.       She was born in Springfield on December 29,...
data.meta_site_name: Shirley Savery Obituary | January 1, 2011 | Kelly Funeral Home - Lee, MA
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
